children.subject: Yes, it's possible. Please send it to us today along with an explanation of your situation. cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu
Thanks for the reply. I've sent the form to cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu and cc'd you as well. Thanks for the help!
If I can't make to the drop -in, would it be possible for me to send my petition form to the advisor via email, and once they sign and send it back to me, I submit online? Thanks!

history.content:
Reminder that this deadline is Friday at 4PM.

CS majors need a CS Advisor's signature. Appointments are booked for this week, so come to drop-in advising on Wed, 10-12 & 1-4PM in 349 Soda. We can't guarantee we can help you outside of these hours since we're booked for the week, so please take advantage of drop-in hours!

CS-intended students: you do not need our signature, but we encourage you to come talk about your situation in drop-in, especially if you're considering late dropping a CS class.
history.subject: L&S Deadline Reminder: Late change of schedule forms are due FRIDAY, 12/13 at 4PM to L&S
